title: How did Grosjean survive that crash?
description: Romain Grosjean had a miracle escape at the Bahrain Grand Prix. We look at what happened and the role Halo played.

itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
